DOC.brief_summary: This study will include a screening period, a 6-month treatment period, and a 60-month, long-term extension period.
DOC.brief_title: Safety & Efficacy Study of ALXN1101 in Pediatric Patients With MoCD Type A Currently Treated With rcPMP
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will receive daily IV infusions of ALXN1101 starting on Day 1. After a prescribed period, dosing will increase monthly based on defined patient safety measures. After Month 6, patients will continue daily dosing through Month 66 at their last tolerated dose.
DOC.criteria: Male or female patients with a genetically confirmed diagnosis of MoCD Type A (MOCS1 mutation) Currently treated with rcPMP infusions Current or planned treatment with another investigational drug or device, with the exception rcPMP treatment through Day 1.
